meta.methodology_note: Year-adjusted scoring: model comparisons use same-year national averages. Age-band comparisons use weighted national averages. Only vehicles with 11+ years of data are classified as 'proven' durability.

summary.vs_national_note: Manufacturer average vs overall national average (for brand-level comparison)

age_adjusted.methodology: Compares each model's pass rate against the national average for cars of the same age. A positive score means the model performs better than average for its age.

methodology.description: Evidence-tiered durability scoring based on proven long-term data
methodology.proven_threshold: 11+ years of MOT data required for 'proven' durability claims
methodology.early_caveat: Vehicles under 7 years old have not yet proven long-term durability
methodology.scoring: Performance vs national average for vehicles of the same age

reliability_summary.methodology_note: Rating based only on vehicles with 11+ years of MOT data

durability_champions.description: Vehicles with PROVEN durability - 11+ years old and still performing above average

models_to_avoid.description: Vehicles with PROVEN poor durability - 11+ years old and performing below average

early_performers.description: Newer vehicles showing strong early results (3-6 years)
early_performers.caveat: Durability NOT yet proven - these vehicles have not been tested at older ages
